English: can bow and submit, or can stand tall (idiom, from Book of Changes); ready to give and take
francais: peut s'incliner et soumettre ou peut se tenir droit (proverbes du Yi Jing)

d.f: `失意~`時~`能~`克制~`忍耐~，`得意~`時~`能~`施展~`抱負~。

English: can bow and submit, or can stand tall (idiom, from Book of Changes); ready to give and take
